text: FIFA 18 is a 2017 association football simulation video game in Electronic Arts' FIFA series created by EA Vancouver and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for the Playstation 3, Playstation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Microsoft Windows. title: FIFA 18
